s-1.ptxt: INSPECT REAR NO. 1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER RH

s2.ptxt: When the inclination of the retractor is 15째 or less, check that the belt can be pulled from the retractor. When the inclination of the retractor is over 45째, check that the belt locks.
If the operation is not as specified, replace the belt.

s-1.ptxt: INSPECT REAR NO. 2 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER RH

s2.ptxt: When the inclination of the retractor is 15째 or less, check that the belt can be pulled from the retractor. When the inclination of the retractor is over 45째, check that the belt locks.
If the operation is not as specified, replace the belt.
